column1: Tailai County (simplified Chinese: 泰来县; traditional Chinese: 泰來縣; pinyin: Tàilái Xiàn) is a county in the west of Heilongjiang province
column3: bordering Inner Mongolia to the west and Jilin province to the south. It is the southernmost county-level division of the prefecture-level city of Qiqihar.

column1: The population of the district was 322
